sentences.en: A : Sampras looks pretty good. Oh my God, he is such a stud.
sentences.cn: ( 山普拉斯 看起来很棒, 喔,我的天, 他真是个大帅哥. )

sentences.en: An Arc Stud Welding Controller with Date Acquisition Function.
sentences.cn: 具有数据采集功能的电弧螺柱焊控制器.

sentences.en: Ariza was a stud from the start here Thursday.
sentences.cn: 阿里扎从周四一开始就给球队注入了强心剂.

sentences.en: Gordon: He is a stud. He would dump you after one night.
sentences.cn: 戈登: 他可是个帅哥, 可能一晚上就把你蹬了.

sentences.en: He played only draw and stud.
sentences.cn: 他只玩抽牌(draw) 和沙蟹牌(stud)游戏.

sentences.en: He runs stud farm in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他在爱尔兰经营一家种马场.

sentences.en: He was voted horse of the year and then was retired to stud.
sentences.cn: 这匹马被评为年度冠军后就退役成了种马。

sentences.en: I give you Kinky Kelly and the Sexy Stud!
sentences.cn: 我向你们介绍古怪凯丽和性感种马!

sentences.en: I'm going to put the horse out to stud.
sentences.cn: 我打算把这匹马用来配种.
小小的岛屿散布在海湾内.

sentences.en: Mark thinks he is a real stud.
sentences.cn: 马克认为自己是非常性感的男人.

sentences.en: Moreover, we can manufacture the steel stud based on YOUR architectual drawings.
sentences.cn: 此外, 我们可根据你所提供的建筑图纸生产钢立筋框架房屋.

sentences.en: She stud the young man with her sharp bright eyes.
sentences.cn: 她用明亮锐利的眼睛端详这年轻男士.

sentences.en: the park was studded with daisies
This essay makes a basic description for future stud welding development trend.
sentences.cn: 在此通过对螺柱焊接行业的发展趋势作以探讨.

sentences.en: This horse has been retired from racing and has now been put out to stud.
sentences.cn: 这匹马已不再参加比赛,现在用作配种.

sentences.en: Use a regular stud plus a “trimmer” on each side of the door.
sentences.cn: 使用常规壁骨，然后在门的两边各加一条“装饰边”。

words.tran_cn: 用功的；热心的；专心的；故意的；适于学习的
学习，研究；课题；书房；学问
种马；[五金]大头钉；饰纽；壁骨
散布；用许多饰钮等装饰

柱焊，嵌柱焊接；螺柱焊接；电栓焊

trans.tran_cn: 种马的；为配种而饲养的
种马，大头钉，（衣袖等的）饰钮，[建]壁骨
trans.tran_en: the use of animals, especially horses, for breeding, an animal that is used in this way, or a place where this is done
